group_1.textLeft: How nice.
You're lucky I'm not one of those frightful Magical@Girl hunters.
We're short on time, so I'll start from my conclusion.
You received information from your teammates that@led you to suspect me, and have been fishing for@information.
As for why I became convinced of this...@there's four points.
One. You suddenly started asking about Asunaro@City after your phone calls.
Two. When I mentioned that Asunaro was@dangerous, your reaction told me you already@expected as much.
Three. You were more concerned about attacks@from fellow Magical Girls than about Witches.
And four. You never said anything about whether@you were able to contact your team via your Gem.
And, as one last detail...
You did a very good job of relaxing me with the@coffee you brewed.

group_1.textRight: A-amazing...@Er, I mean, I'm so sorry!

group_1.textLeft: No, it's only natural.@Please don't apologize. But...
Could you please lend me your help?
Kako! Why'd you come here...?

group_1.textRight: I asked her some questions, just like you told me to...

group_1.textLeft: Well, technically it was Nanaka's plan and not mine.
But did you get anything about that rumor of@Magical Girls disappearing?
Is she the Gem-stealing girl?
I knew it!
She's pretending to search for her friends so she@can attack people!
I heard about it before from another city's@Magical Girl.

group_1.textCenter: What sort of rumor did you hear?

group_1.textLeft: She said it's a girl with her hair tied to one side@in a ribbon, well-defined eyebrows...
And that she suddenly switches from joking around@to talking like someone out of a period drama...

group_1.textCenter: Well, I think that hardly describes me.

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Wait, that wasn't you talking just now,@right Kako...?
Y-you...!!

group_1.textRight: I'm Umika Misaki. A Magical Girl from Asunaro City.

group_1.textLeft: Uh... hang on, what?
This girl's threatening you, isn't she?!@Hang on, I'll save you!
I'm not goin' down easy. I swear on the name of@the Shinobu Dojo...!

group_1.textRight: I'd quite like to ask you about karate some time.@But...
Kako isn't the one who needs saving right now.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300800:effect_ef_adv_01][se:7201_detect_magic]Ah, my Gem's reacting!@There's a Witch nearby...!
Geeze, there's Witches popping up every minute@today!
